p: To remove contaminating TAGs, all peaks with the ratio of mean intensity in plant samples to mean intensity in blank samples below four were removed ( Supplementary Figure S1). To obtain TAG mass fractions, the intensity of each TAG ( Table S2) was divided by the sum of intensities for all TAGs in the given sample. Wilcoxon test with the Benjaminiâ€“Hochberg (BH) correction was used to assess the statistical significance of the observed differences.
